solution.text:
From part (i),
Radius of the cone, r\(=_{k}_\,cm\)
Height of the cone, h\(=_{j}_\,cm\)
Slant height of the cone, l\(=\sqrt{r^2+h^2}\)
\(=\sqrt{_{k}_^2+_{j}_^2}\)
\(=\sqrt{_{{k**2+j**2}}_}\)
\(\Rightarrow l=_{{trunc(((k**2+j**2)**Decimal(0.5)),3)}}_\,cm\)

content.text: The slant height of the cone.
